column9: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2020
column14: smells great and my wife can't keep her hands off me after I shower.... old spice ain't got nothing on this. Only downfall is the neighbors wife gets a wiff of me and starts hitting on me also. Had to get her with my electric fly swatter once.

column6: Don't trust this seller and Amazon never does anything aboout this behavior.
column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2021
column14: The picture is a lie and does not match because this product is from 2007 and not what is displayed. I contacted Axe headquarters and they responded "We recommend disposing of the product as this only has a three year shelf life". Thanks Amazon for always ripping me off because you have 0 quality control; people could likely sell anthrax on this site and get away with it.

column6: SADLY WE IN CA SEE A ***WARNING***
column9: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2021
column14: I don't get it. I went to reorder this product because my bf loved it. BUT when I went to check out it has a prop 65 warning. Then I went to order a different 1 and same thing. What the warning said is that it may cause reproductive harm. Thankfully my bf isn't making babies with me but I still wonder if it can cause other harm. Overall why on earth would any body wash contain such ingredients as to cause reproductive warnings? I just think we here in America are very lax about all these products containing dangerous ingredients. I hope in the future that a group will take this matter on and insist on ingredients being used to not cause any harm in any way. I know they can make great products at good prices still that are better for us.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2021
column14: Showered with them that morning and 3 girls in bikini's showed up driving a red Ferrari. Film crew showed up not long after and asked me to be in a commercial and then the lottery office called to tell me I won. All kidding aside, they smell great and last most of the day.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2020
column14: I absolutely love the lasting scent of this body wash. And the bottle lasted me well over a month. Bought it in August, had an empty bottle early October. Since AXE is thick, you don’t need a lot to create a good lather. It was hard for me to find this one in stores where I live so Amazon had it and it arrived quickly with other hygiene products I had also gotten. Typical store price, great product. The scent can be smelled on skin long after your shower. I’ve received compliments :)

column6: Perfect product, not as great shipping
column9: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2020
column14: The product itself is perfect. My husband and I both love this scent of axe body wash. He loves it because it "froths" up wonderfully and spreads over you really good. A little goes a long way. It leaves him smelling amazing. I even use it because I do not mind the scent. The smell is strong, but once it is rinsed off is just a lovely touch of near cologne.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2020
column14: It is the same product as you buy in-store but they were not sealed well in the box and all leaked a fair amount, hence I removed a star.

column6: It washes and cleans...plus it smells good.
column9: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2020
column14: Scent is subjective so if you're reading this review, I won't go on about scent.
